ygData.subject: Good 1hs for human warriors?
ygData.msgSnippet: Alright.. more questions. As I said before, I m 19 now and I m looking for some new weopons/places to visit. I originally didn t like my warrior, but not that
ygData.messageBody:
Alright.. more questions.

As I said before, I'm 19 now and I'm looking for some new weopons/places to
visit. I originally didn't like my warrior, but not that I have double
attack/double damage I'm doing great.

This leads to my question. I have these weopons:

1hs Berzerker's sword
1hs Kodiac Claws

I also have a 2hb item: Drakkel Icebringer.

I put the DI in the bank and have been using the two 1hs in conjunction.
What is my next logical step to get a better sword for either hand?

Denis

Denis A. Baldwin (A+/MCP/I-Net+/Net+/CCA)
Network Administrator, CAE, Inc.
810-231-9373, ext. 229
